actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Cotton, Rice, and Sugar.
Referred to Subcommittee on Wheat, Soybeans, and Feed Grains.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Cotton, Rice, and Sugar
Subcommittee on Wheat, Soybeans, and Feed Grains

official_title: A bill to amend the Food Security Act of 1985 to allow family members to assist other family members in their farming operations without becoming one entity for the purpose of deficiency payments.

summary.text: Amends the Food Security Act of 1985, effective for the 1987 through 1990 crops, to prohibit the Secretary of Agriculture from denying a person status as a separate person (for purposes of agricultural benefit payment limitations) solely on the ground that such person received loan assistance and equipment, land, or labor from a family member.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Food Security Act of 1985 to allow family members to assist other family members in their farming operations without becoming one entity for the purpose of deficiency payments.
